pages.text: $(o)You can store most kinds of Power in an item. You'd think you could just #(4)put the solution in a bottle$(0), but-- well, why don't you try it? You'll see the problem. Can you think of some $(4)other material$(0) to make a bottle out of?
$(o)If you're having trouble harvesting from the Crucible using a bottle, consider how you get water out of Cauldron. It's the same procedure here.
